Name: Better Elevator Scripts
Description: Adds a better elevator script with a lot of customisation

Name: Climbing
Description: Allows you to climb on objects ( only staionsary objects )

Name: Code Computer
Description: Adds a code computer, allowing players to join custom codes

Name: ColorSliders
Description: Adds a new way to change the players color with sliders like from Gorilla Tag ( you have to actually grab them not only just push them )

Name: CUPSS
Description: CUPSS allows you to create a folder and import and export assets from and to any unity project

Name: EasyInputs
Description: EasyInputs is a core package to handle VR Inputs / Makes it easier to make VR Inputs

Name: Horror AI Plus
Description: Horror AI Plus is the best horror AI package you can get with A LOT of customisation and features

Name: Laser
Description: You can add lasers to your guns or have laser pointers

Name: Name Computer
Description: Allows players to change their name in game

Name: Scene Tabs
Description: Adds a little window where you can see all your scenes, favoutire them and open them with a customisable hotkey

Name: Screenshotter & Send To Discord
Description: Allows players to take a screenshot, using an image camera which then gets sent to a discord channel

Name: Send Message To Discord
Description: Allows players to send messages to a discord channel in game

Name: Computer Tabs
Description: Allows players to switch to different tabs on a computer so like from Name to Code ( there are 2 options on which script you want to use )
